inputsClass.name: actionControls
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets action controls (actions available for individual items). If not given, it defaults to standard actions.
inputsClass.description: Sets action controls (actions available for individual items). If not given, it defaults to standard actions.

inputsClass.name: activeClassName
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Sets the class name used for active rows (last clicked).
Set empty string to disable appending active class to grid rows.
inputsClass.description: Sets the class name used for active rows (last clicked). Set empty string to disable appending active class to grid rows.

inputsClass.name: baseQuery
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the base query which is appended to the request for data.
inputsClass.description: Sets the base query which is appended to the request for data.

inputsClass.name: bulkActionControls
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets bulk action controls (actions available for items selected by user). If not given, it defaults to standard bulk actions.
inputsClass.description: Sets bulk action controls (actions available for items selected by user). If not given, it defaults to standard bulk actions.

inputsClass.name: columns
inputsClass.rawdescription: The list of columns to be displayed in the grid. If not given, it defaults to standard columns.
inputsClass.description: The list of columns to be displayed in the grid. If not given, it defaults to standard columns.

inputsClass.name: dataCallback
inputsClass.rawdescription: Optional callback function that allows to modify server side data result before it's rendered.
inputsClass.description: Optional callback function that allows to modify server side data result before it's rendered.

inputsClass.name: headerActionControls
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets header action controls (actions available from the grid header). If not given, it defaults to empty list of actions.
inputsClass.description: Sets header action controls (actions available from the grid header). If not given, it defaults to empty list of actions.

inputsClass.name: legacyConfigKey
inputsClass.deprecationMessage: Internal use only: used to define user preferences key under which 'All devices' column config is stored.

jsdoctags.comment: Internal use only: used to define user preferences key under which 'All devices' column config is stored.

inputsClass.name: legacyFilterKey
inputsClass.deprecationMessage: Internal use only: used to define user preferences key under which 'All devices' filter/sorting config is stored.

jsdoctags.comment: Internal use only: used to define user preferences key under which 'All devices' filter/sorting config is stored.

inputsClass.name: loadMoreItemsLabel
inputsClass.rawdescription: The label for load more button.

inputsClass.name: pagination
inputsClass.rawdescription: Pagination settings, e.g. allows for setting current page or page size. If not given, defaults to standard settings.
inputsClass.description: Pagination settings, e.g. allows for setting current page or page size. If not given, defaults to standard settings.

inputsClass.name: refresh
inputsClass.rawdescription: Takes an event emitter. When an event is emitted, the grid will be reloaded.
inputsClass.description: Takes an event emitter. When an event is emitted, the grid will be reloaded.

inputsClass.name: selectable
inputsClass.rawdescription: Determines whether items can be selected by clicking a checkbox in the first column.
inputsClass.description: Determines whether items can be selected by clicking a checkbox in the first column.

inputsClass.name: showSearch
inputsClass.rawdescription: Enables the search for devices where any device propery is matched agains the search term. Enabled by default. This input does not take effect if the childDeviceGrid input is set to true
inputsClass.description: Enables the search for devices where any device propery is matched agains the search term. Enabled by default. This input does not take effect if the childDeviceGrid input is set to true

inputsClass.name: singleSelection
inputsClass.rawdescription: Restricts selection to a single row only. Selection column displays radio button instead of checkboxes
inputsClass.description: Restricts selection to a single row only. Selection column displays radio button instead of checkboxes

inputsClass.name: title
inputsClass.rawdescription: The title for the data grid, it's displayed in the grid's header.
inputsClass.description: The title for the data grid, it's displayed in the grid's header.

inputsClass.name: withChildren
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the withChildren query which is appended to the request.
inputsClass.description: Sets the withChildren query which is appended to the request.

outputsClass.name: itemsSelect
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits an event when items selection changes. The array contains ids of selected items.
outputsClass.description: Emits an event when items selection changes. The array contains ids of selected items.

outputsClass.name: onColumnsChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits an event when columns configuration changes.
outputsClass.description: Emits an event when columns configuration changes.

setSignature.name: _pagination
setSignature.rawdescription: Pagination settings, e.g. allows for setting current page or page size. If not given, defaults to standard settings.
setSignature.description: Pagination settings, e.g. allows for setting current page or page size. If not given, defaults to standard settings.

setSignature.name: _actionControls
setSignature.rawdescription: Sets action controls (actions available for individual items). If not given, it defaults to standard actions.
setSignature.description: Sets action controls (actions available for individual items). If not given, it defaults to standard actions.

setSignature.name: _bulkActionControls
setSignature.rawdescription: Sets bulk action controls (actions available for items selected by user). If not given, it defaults to standard bulk actions.
setSignature.description: Sets bulk action controls (actions available for items selected by user). If not given, it defaults to standard bulk actions.

setSignature.name: _headerActionControls
setSignature.rawdescription: Sets header action controls (actions available from the grid header). If not given, it defaults to empty list of actions.
setSignature.description: Sets header action controls (actions available from the grid header). If not given, it defaults to empty list of actions.
